title: This website
description: Yes, this website. I found myself in the spot where job market is extremely volatile, my resume is in-between positions and my programming skills haven't been refreshed since 2020. I decided to see if I can pick up React and create this to support my resume. You can check out the code below!

title: Implementation of a company-wide Hackathon events
description: Introduced the concept of Hackathons in North American part of the company, later scaled to company-wide. Developed front-end of the Hackathon website, developed MVP of backend. Engaged a team to finish the product, organized communication and events around Hackathon organization

title: Enabling effective monetization of connected car data
description: Built the MVP platform that would allow data monetization in automotive fleet insurance use cases. Read gps and visual based monitoring and predictive maintenance for fleet vehicles. New architecture had been submitted as an Open-Source standard to SOAFEE. Utilized S32G ARM SOC boards with CAN Bus and OBD2 connection. Organized entire product delivery cycle starting with chip delivery to Moter and finishing with in-vehicle testing.

title: Automatic RTK base station assignment to a field
description: Implementation of the system of automatic RTK base station switch according to a GPS position and related field. Enabled off-hands operation and removed errors in boundary mapping, as well as boundary drift for existing fields. Yes, that's me in the tractor.

title: AutoTrac Headland Boundaries
description: Implementation of the feature that helped farmers to better plan automatic machine turns while autopilot is engaged, by creating virtual boundaries of the crop, field, or aligning to physical boundaries of the farm, and then calculating the turn radius based on multiple parameters, such as implement width, machine type, and, of course, boundary parameters.

title: Advanced TCM Calibration
description: Implementation of a completely new method of performing yaw and pitch calibration for Cab and Implement installed GPS receivers. That feature is now used on every single machine produced as part of factory calibration process AND by every farmer using the equipment for on-land corrections.

title: Operations Center
description: Implementation of several parts of John Deere Operations Center, business-critical online operations management system that enables complete data sync between machines, management of the multiple farms and job sites, and provides Farm Managers with comprehensive information on field and work status. Our teams helped to bring this product to market.

title: Precision Construction Technology
description: Based on the previous experience with bringing up Operations Center, created a MVP for the Precision Technology management dashboard for construction equipment. Team created mapping, balancers, machine connectivity, dashboard for job site management and comprehensive statuses for machines.

title: HarvestLab Connect
description: Imnplementation of the iOS application and connection point for streaming data from the grain analysis device.

title: Prime Brokerage Cross-Margin Risk and AnalysisSystem
description: Risk and Margin analysis for Prime Brokerage, real time risk assessment, liquidity analysis and a platform for managing cross margin on the portfolios.
